post-layout
  • jekyll does not use switches anymore
  • jekyll has a command subsystem now

to have jekyll regenerate your site on change - [0] find out how to 'watch' the subdirs

def print_hi(name)
  puts "Hi, #{name}"
end
print_hi('Tom')
#=> prints 'Hi, Tom' to STDOUT.
